Articles.Content:
![ATV-3D-view.jpg](http://orbitalhub.com/wp-content/uploads/2008/09/ATV-3D-view.jpg)
***ARIANE 5 AND ATV***

The ATV was one of the most flexible spacecraft ever made. Produced by the ESA and launched aboard the Ariane 5, the ATV was a cargo spacecraft for the International Space Station. The last one departed and burned up in the atmosphere several months ago, but it lives on in the form of the Orion spacecraft's service module. Feast yer' eyes!

***Craft Info:*** ATV + Ariane 5 is 110 parts, ATV alone is 38. 18 tons, 1200 m/s of dv.

Action shots:

Thanks for viewing, and leave some rep if you enjoyed!
You are a very busy builder! Another lovely craft from you. Keep it up mate.

Oooh, another ship! Very nice!

One suggestion though, maybe you could make the fairing a little pointier? The Ariane 5's fairings are supposed to be sharper.

But very nice anyways! Repped!
